fields.description: Informs which system delivered the message to HL7 Validation API. This does not need to be set by the entity uploading the message, is hardcoded to DEX-ROUTING by the Router FN probably. So, might not be in this file in the end.
Identifies if the message is a CASE message or ELR
Informs the type of ELR messages when message_type = ELR
Informs which jurisdiction is uploading the message
Tells the original file name at the source of the message
Tells the original file timestamp at the source of the message
